review: Just the ticket for a great selection of movies and TV series. The menu is superior to the one I was using on my blue ray player. Was able to add Netflix which was a great improvement also. The Fire Stick was easy to set up and is a breeze use. I says this being a senior who is tech challenged. As always great product from Amazon and fast shipping.
author: George

review: Fire Stick appears to work as advertised.  But,  I am trying to use it to connect with Slingbox and it appears that there is some form of ISP block which keeps disconnecting Slingbox from the 'net.  Because of this, I have not been able to give Firestick a fair trial.  We'll keep trying.  Fred S
author: Fred S

review: Bought for Sling TV which doesn't work well. Sling TV customer service told me tough luck. I still have to pay for 3 months of service which is barely visible. Amazon gave me $10, but do not buy for Sling TV!!!  You've been warned.
author: Jason

review: Great for the bedroom TV, a few issues with My Wifi (blocked signal) once I got that resolved everything is cool. Good product, for such a small device. L I K E .
author: no1amigo "no1amigo"

review: We love the Fire Stuck! Perfect for upstairs in our bedroom.
author: Megan Miles

review: Wasn't sure that someone a little older and technically challenged would be able to figure this out, but I did!  I use the Fire TV Stick on my tv in the basement when I am on my exercise bike and treadmill.  I now look forward to exercising as I am able to watch a HBO series that I have always wanted to access, but didn't want to spend the money for HBO on cable.  Great invention.
author: Claire Sullivan

review: This works awesome.  I love being able to watch MLBTV and Sling TV with no issues. plus i can watch my prime tv and movies.  I am very impressed
author: JustBrianMeyer

review: Device has poor apps.Cable company I use not offered on hbogo or showtime.The only redeeming point is it comes with a remote.Kindle does not cast well with this device.
